issue.title: [C++] Enable arrow::ipc internal JSON reader to read from a file path
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This may make tests easier to write. Currently an input buffer is required, so reading from a file requires some boilerplate

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4409?focusedCommentId=17392975) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I'm not sure for which purpose precisely this was intended, but nowadays the "simple JSON" format makes it easy to write tests without even involving ancillary files.
